Posts.Content: Many thanks @Grogg for answering you have given me hope that my bad thoughts should be put to one side as it may not be what I think. Your reply has made me see reason so thank you again . I hope you are still well xx
Posts.Title: Terrified again

Posts.Content: afternoon I have breast cancer which was diagnosed on the 18th Jan 2018 and which is being treated with letrazole. Thankfully the tumour has shrunk, this they found out in August when I had clips put in so I was told I would just have regular checks. I had a mammogram four weeks ago and have just had a phone call out of the blue to ask me to go for a scan as there has been a change in the other breast, all this the day before my first oncology appointment. I am now confused and terrified and just want to run away and scream, please has anybody else had this xx
Posts.Title: Terrified again

Posts.Content: Thank you @HappyFeet for answering yes I suppose I am seeing the worse case and you have bought me back to reality.   I just didn't expect this so came like a bolt out of the blue. Appointment for scan is tomorrow at 12 just hope my shaking legs will get me there your hugs are greatfully received  charlie Lou xx
Posts.Title: Terrified again

Posts.Content: Morning @Cannyannie I am so sorry to read this and my heart goes out to you I like you thought the Letrazole for me  in your case chemo would "just work for all" so to be recalled after a month was pure hell. I am just counting down the hours till I am back upto the breast unit today at 12. Keep strong and if you need to shout or scream or  chat just pop me a note and I will be there for you xxx
Posts.Title: Terrified again

Posts.Content: Mammogram then ultra sound .... and all clear it turns out it's where I have lost weight (fatty tissue) so so happy only one boob to worry about. Off to my first oncology app tomorrow so that should be fine. thanks for asking, how was your day? X
Posts.Title: Terrified again
